column4: how do i view the memory usage of a particular process. In top there are too many process i want to watch only one
try htop, it's a bit nicer IMHO. Or if you're in gnome, use gnome-system-monitor
can we collect stats for that process over time
I think you need a special tool to monitor just a single process, or perhaps find some "filtering and logging" switches in top/htop. But I have no idea really.
